subject: Greetings my good friend,
body:
Greetings my good friend,
I am Barrister Chris Onu, i contacted you for a business transaction
some time ago but something led to another and we couldn't achieve our
aim of transferring the money to your Bank account as planned. I'm
happy to inform you that i have had the fund transferred with the
cooperation of a new partner from Japan Presently, I'm in Japan for
investment projects with my own share of the total sum.
 My new partner Mrs. Y≈çko Kamikawa tested Positive in Covid-19, I
gives praise to God that she recovered from the virus after adequate
and constant treatment. Meanwhile, I have not forgotten your past
efforts and attempt to assist me in transferring those funds despite
that it failed us somehow. Now contact my personal secretary Mrs.
Linda Joy via her Email:
( 
lj9678713@gmail.com
 )  ask her to send you a certified ATM VISA
CARD, sealed and kept in an envelope worth (US$850,000.00 ) I kept it
for your compensation for all the past efforts and attempts to assist
me in this matter. I appreciate your collective efforts at that time
so, feel free and get in touch with my secretary. Please, do let me
know immediately you receive it so that we can share the joy after all
the suffering at that time.
At moment, I am very busy here in JAPAN because of the investment
projects which I and the new partner are having at hand without
confrontations. As a straight forwarded person, I instructed my
secretary to make sure she carries out the assignment of 100%. So feel
free to get in touch with her and she will act according to my
directives.  My Regards to your good family.
Yours Sincerely.
Barrister Chris Onu. Plesae reply back from this E-mail Address
( 
lj9678713@gmail.com
 )

subject: Re: Greetings my good friend,
body:
Hello Barrister Chris Onu,

It's a pleasure to hear from you again! I'm glad to know that you're doing well in Japan and that your partner, Mrs. ko Kamikawa, has recovered from the virus. That's indeed a reason to give praise.

I remember our previous interactions and although we couldn't achieve our aim at that time, it was an interesting experience for me. You mentioned about an ATM VISA CARD kept by your secretary Mrs. lj for me? That's quite generous of you!

Could you please tell me more about this card? How can I get in touch with Mrs. lj? And what should I expect once I receive this card?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael
